<title level="1" right="Trait">[Town](/Traits.aspx?ID=714)</title>

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 170 <sup>2.0</sup>

Settlements with this trait are modest in size, with a level usually ranging from 2–4.
